lead_paragraph: In a raw news conference on Thursday, President Trump dismissed reports about contacts between his advisers and Russia and said his administration was not chaotic.
snippet: In a raw news conference on Thursday, President Trump dismissed reports about contacts between his advisers and Russia and said his administration was not chaotic....

headline.main: ‘I Inherited a Mess,’ Trump Says, Defending His Performance
headline.print_headline: Trump Delivers Heated Defense of First Month
